mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.inserted, n.updated, u.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount FROM tb_board_news n JOIN tb_user u ON n.memberId = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_reply_news r ON n.id = r.boardId WHERE content like concat('%',#{search},'%' ) GROUP BY n.id ORDER BY n.id DESC
SELECT id, postId, fileName, url, isThumbnail FROM tb_file_news WHERE postId =#{boardId}

SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, (SELECT count(postId) FROM tb_board_news_up WHERE postId = p.id) up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT nu.userId FROM tb_board_news_up nu WHERE nu.userId = #{loginId} AND nu.postId=p.id) upposession FROM tb_board_news p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId LEFT JOIN tb_reply_news r ON p.id = r.boardId
GROUP BY p.id Order By p.id DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, (SELECT count(postId) FROM tb_board_news_up WHERE postId = p.id) up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT hu.userId FROM tb_board_news_up hu WHERE hu.userId = #{loginId} AND hu.postId=p.id) upposession FROM tb_board_news p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId LEFT JOIN tb_reply_news r ON p.id = r.boardId
WHERE p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, (SELECT count(postId) FROM tb_board_news_up WHERE postId = p.id) up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT hu.userId FROM tb_board_news_up hu WHERE hu.userId = #{loginId} AND hu.postId=p.id) upposession FROM tb_board_news p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId LEFT JOIN tb_reply_news r ON p.id = r.boardId
WHERE p.memberId = #{Id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board_news (memberId, location, tag, title, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{location}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board_news SET tag = #{tag}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_board_news SET views = views +1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, postId, fileName, COUNT(postId) countpostId FROM tb_file_news GROUP BY postId;
SELECT id, postId, fileName, COUNT(postId) countpostId FROM tb_file_news WHERE postId=#{id} GROUP BY postId;
